abovebeyond.lifesavers.title: Lifesavers
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests0.title: Choo Choo
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests0.descripti: Minecarts are the most flexible mid-range item transport available to you. Seriously, once you've build one railway connection to transfer items between areas, you will never be able to stop adding more. The convenience of these loaders is just off the charts.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests1.title: Control Centre
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests1.descripti: With new circuitry and wiring capability, you can make your factory a little smarter. Also those lamps you can make are really pretty.

For an actual piece of advice: it is pretty simple to set up a little circuit at a few points in your factory, which detect when an item has not been produced in a while. You can use redstone links to redirect those signals to a central control room, giving you an overview of which sections require maintenance.
The circuit on site is basically a tug of war between a slow timer and a content observer detecting the items. The Counter available from circuit stonecutting works perfectly for this.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests2.title: Engineer's Companion
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests2.descripti: Especially while building new Contraptions, this gadget is incredibly handy. Instead of filling up your pockets with components, simply pick up the toolbox from the workshop and bring it with you.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests3.title: Immersive Minimap
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests3.descripti: A cute alternative to the all-powerful map hud is the atlas.
Aside from the fantastic feel and design; these atlases can be copied and handed to your friends. If one of the owners explores new Territory or places a marker, everyone else will see it too.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests4.title: Big Barrels II
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests4.descripti: If you are looking for extra large but specialised storage space in a block, check out Storage Drawers.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests5.title: The Joy of Cooking
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests5.descripti: Stoves are a good-looking and very useful campfire alternative. Together with a Cooking Pot, it can help you prepare the most delicious meals in the game.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests6.title: Hotswap replace
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests6.descripti: Exchangers make for a nice tool to replace blocks with others. Saves you a lot of digging.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests7.title: Blockstacker
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests7.descripti: Construction wands can extend complete walls or surfaces of blocks by the click of a button.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests8.title: Pass me the butter
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests8.descripti: Human Arms just aren't evolved to build machines efficiently, yet. Thankfully this gadget can make up for it by increasing your reach distance significantly.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests9.descripti: Sometimes it is desirable to travel to a specific Biome. The Nature's Compass can at least point you in the right direction.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests10.title: Big Barrels
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests10.descript: In case you need large universal storage space in a block, check out the upgrade options for wooden barrels.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests11.title: House Building Cannon
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests11.descript: With the help of Schematicannons, any .nbt Schematic can be built into your world. Use it to replicate parts of your Building, or even to prepare it in a completely different World ahead of time.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests12.title: Big Plans
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests12.descript: These Blueprints can be given one or more crafting recipes, which they then apply to your held items whenever you right-click them.

The quickest and most effective way to assign recipes is to locate the recipe in JEI while the blueprint UI is open. Clicking the '+' in the JEI recipe view will transfer the recipe ingredients to the blueprint for you.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests13.title: Pressure Tube
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests13.descript: Belts and Arms are great, but sometimes we will still give in to the guilty pleasure of using item pipes.
These tubes however can even serve as a pretty sophisticated logistical infrastructure. Blocks like the Item- or Crafting Terminal will be able to request items from any chests connected to them.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests14.title: Induction Conduits
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests14.descript: With the rise of Inductive Machinery, you'll want to have the option to connect dynamos and machines together in an energy grid.

Something to look out for is that these ducts do not always know when to extract power from a block. You can use a Wrench to sneak-click the pipe connection near the block in order to enable/disable pulling.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests15.title: Bottoms up!
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests15.descript: You can use a Keg to create your favourite brews. Drink Responsibly.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests16.title: Friend?
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests16.descript: Placing a Carved Pumpkin on a Hay Bale creates a Straw Golem, who can take care of your crops.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests17.title: Roll for Intelligence
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests17.descript: Sometimes it is hard to make up ones' mind. Thankfully, we have technology to help us make our decision.
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests18.title: The other Gamemode
abovebeyond.lifesavers.quests18.descript: Magic Feathers grant flight to the weilder, albeit only within the range of a Beacon Beam. Still, this should be of great help in setting up big factories!

abovebeyond.market.quests5.description0: &6The Market&r gives you options to spend your money on a variety of fun and useful items and gadgets.
abovebeyond.market.quests5.description1: Have a look around. I'm sure you'll find something of use.

abovebeyond.market.quests7.subtitle: Silver -> Gold
abovebeyond.market.quests7.description0: Some trades require you to hand in Gold Coins. These are worth a stack of Silver each.

abovebeyond.market.quests10.subtitle: 50 Silver
abovebeyond.market.quests10.description0: This mysterious fellow is offering a puzzle box with seemingly endless layers of depth. As an expert you know that this can only be finite. But what will await you at the bottom?

abovebeyond.overview.title: Overview
abovebeyond.overview.quests0.title: Andesite Machinery
abovebeyond.overview.quests0.subtitle: Milestone
abovebeyond.overview.quests0.description: With Kinetic Mechanisms automated, many new possibilities unfold. Most of Create's machinery can now be crafted without much hassle. The early game just got a bit less early!
You can now continue, or choose to spend some time in the bonus section of Chapter 1. After all, a stronger supply of Copper Machines will come to be quite useful, too!
abovebeyond.overview.quests1.title: Brass Machinery
abovebeyond.overview.quests1.subtitle: Milestone
abovebeyond.overview.quests1.description: With Precision Mechanisms automated, a large number of great tools become accessible. Both for automation and quality of life.
It also opens the gate leading towards the Invar Age- potentially after a quick stop by the bonus section..
abovebeyond.overview.quests2.title: Invar Machinery
abovebeyond.overview.quests2.subtitle: Milestone
abovebeyond.overview.quests2.description: A completely different age of Technology. Some machines are suddenly powered by some hardly observable magical energy.
The Launch feels very close now. While there still lie challenges ahead, the solution footprint will shrink again thanks to the new Appliances.
abovebeyond.overview.quests3.title: Fluix Machinery
abovebeyond.overview.quests3.subtitle: Milestone
abovebeyond.overview.quests3.description: With Calculation Mechanisms, the Factory enters the Digital Age. Instant Material-Energy conversion (ME) revolutionises item and fluid logistics for both the assembly lines and personal use.
At this point, all of the tools necessary to facilitate space travel have become accessible. Might as well start a countdown.
abovebeyond.overview.quests4.title: Copper Machinery
abovebeyond.overview.quests4.subtitle: Utility
abovebeyond.overview.quests4.description: Copper Machines unlock the capability of Fluid Manipulation. Fill, drain, filter and collect liquids for all of your automation needs.
Note that Sealed Mechanisms are an ingredient to nothing else. The main assembly line will continue with Kinetic Mechanisms.
abovebeyond.overview.quests5.title: Zinc Machinery
abovebeyond.overview.quests5.subtitle: Utility
abovebeyond.overview.quests5.description: Zinc Machines are incredibly powerful. From efficient Cobblestone Harvesters to long-ranged Item Collectors, a useful new suite of equipment now sits at the ready.
Note that Infernal Mechanisms are an ingredient to nothing else. The main assembly line will continue with Precision Mechanisms.
abovebeyond.overview.quests6.title: Ender Machinery
abovebeyond.overview.quests6.subtitle: Utility
abovebeyond.overview.quests6.description: Ender Machines provide not only access to instant Teleportation, but also to the most powerful upgrades for your machines.
abovebeyond.overview.quests7.title: From a Tree Puncher...
abovebeyond.overview.quests7.description: Welcome to the Overview. You can always come back here to catch up on your current position in the Progression of Technology. If you look closely, your Journey to the Moon completes the final step of the way on the right side.
abovebeyond.overview.quests8.title: ..to a Spacefarer
abovebeyond.overview.quests8.description: The Dream of walking the Moon's surface finally came to fruition.
With that, the role of this Factory Guide has been fulfilled. Enjoy building up your new Hi-Tech Empire, and we'll see you in the next modpack!
abovebeyond.overview.quests9.title: High Aspirations
abovebeyond.overview.quests9.subtitle: Chapter 1
abovebeyond.overview.quests9.description: The earliest inventions reveal ones resourcefulness with low level equipment: Auto-Crafting? None. Filtering? Not cheap! Item Transport? May the Belt Spaghetti mesh in your favour.
After hitting the Checkmark above, the first Chapter of the Factory Guide will become accessible from the Quest Sidebar.
abovebeyond.overview.quests10.title: Alluring Expedience
abovebeyond.overview.quests10.subtitle: Chapter 2
abovebeyond.overview.quests10.descriptio: The chicken and egg problem remains: in order to automate precision mechanisms for brass equipment more conveniently, having more brass equipment would be really useful!
After hitting the Checkmark above, the second Chapter of the Factory Guide will become accessible from the Quest Sidebar.
abovebeyond.overview.quests11.title: The Catharsis
abovebeyond.overview.quests11.subtitle: Chapter 3
abovebeyond.overview.quests11.descriptio: The Groundwork has been laid with all that has been created so far. The pace should really pick up from here.
Producing components for inductive technology relies on very peculiar techniques. Though with all the new equipment ready, automating even the more convoluted interactions should become a cakewalk.
After hitting the Checkmark above, the third Chapter of the Factory Guide will become accessible from the Quest Sidebar.
abovebeyond.overview.quests12.title: Into the Box
abovebeyond.overview.quests12.subtitle: Chapter 4
abovebeyond.overview.quests12.descriptio: A new Energy Unit joins the ranks: the production facility for silicon will involve an interplay of thermal induction machinery and the familiar kinetic components.
Between Flux and Stress, a peculiar innovation in Laser technology will be required to produce some of the ingredients involved.
After hitting the Checkmark above, the fourth Chapter of the Factory Guide will become accessible from the Quest Sidebar.
abovebeyond.overview.quests13.title: Divide by Digital
abovebeyond.overview.quests13.subtitle: Finale
abovebeyond.overview.quests13.descriptio: The entire factory is started back up for one final sprint. With a steady supply of Calculation Mechanisms, the Digital Infrastucture performs the necessary operations to put together an ideal Trajectory.
While this Data Center visibly crunches the numbers, the designated Astronaut starts getting themselves and the spaceship prepared for launch.
abovebeyond.overview.quests14.title: Rubber Tycoon
abovebeyond.overview.quests14.subtitle: Bonus 1A
abovebeyond.overview.quests14.descriptio: While Copper Machines will definitely be required going forward; full automation of their ingredients is completely optional.
After hitting the Checkmark above, additional Quests located in the First Chapter will be revealed.
abovebeyond.overview.quests15.title: Magmatic Exploits
abovebeyond.overview.quests15.subtitle: Bonus 2A
abovebeyond.overview.quests15.descriptio: Access to Zinc Machines will require for some engineering in another dimension. Even if it's literally Hell, a change of scene will always bring forth new ideas and inspiration.
After hitting the Checkmark above, additional Quests located in the Second Chapter will be revealed.
abovebeyond.overview.quests16.title: Melting the Funds
abovebeyond.overview.quests16.subtitle: Bonus 3A
abovebeyond.overview.quests16.descriptio: The Prospect of Teleportation alone might be reason enough to explore that mysterious End Dimension.
In researching the required technologies, you will find that your hard earned silver suddenly finds a second use..
After hitting the Checkmark above, additional Quests located in the Third Chapter will be revealed.
abovebeyond.overview.quests17.title: Chaotic Alchemy
abovebeyond.overview.quests17.subtitle: Alternative Path
abovebeyond.overview.quests17.descriptio: You'll find that the newly discovered Laser setup has other interesting capabilities.
Behind a bit of science and experimentation lies a way to transmute seemingly unrelated materials between another. The demanded Silicon element is one of them, but which is its counterpart?
After hitting the Checkmark above, the alternative fourth Chapter of the Factory Guide will become accessible from the Quest Sidebar. It will still be possible to return to the other chapter.
abovebeyond.overview.quests18.title: Preparations
abovebeyond.overview.quests18.descriptio: Careful! Before you are ready to embark on the journey of automation, it can help to set up a basic workshop first.
Here are some recommendations for a successful start.
abovebeyond.professions.title: &a Bulletin Board
abovebeyond.professions.quests0.title: Miner
abovebeyond.professions.quests0.descript: Sell &6Igneous Rocks&f, &6Metal Ores&f, &6Gems&f and more with the Mining permit.

abovebeyond.professions.quests1.descript: Sell &6Crops&f, &6Flowers&f, &6Honey&f and more with the Farming permit.
abovebeyond.professions.quests2.title: Carpenter
abovebeyond.professions.quests2.descript: Sell &6Wood Logs&f with the Carpentry permit.
abovebeyond.professions.quests3.title: Chef
abovebeyond.professions.quests3.descript: Sell &6Prepared Food&f with the Cooking permit.
abovebeyond.professions.quests4.title: Mason
abovebeyond.professions.quests4.descript: Sell mass-produced &6Building Blocks&f for a profit with the Masonry permit.
abovebeyond.professions.quests5.title: Hunter
abovebeyond.professions.quests5.descript: Sell all manner of &6Monster Loot&f with the Hunting permit.
abovebeyond.professions.quests6.title: Professions
abovebeyond.professions.quests6.descript: Taking on a &6Profession&r gives you access to a more consistent source of income.
The Profession Cards bought here act as a \"Permit\". All they do is unlock the respective recipes in the Trading Machine. You can absolutely have multiple of these.
abovebeyond.professions.quests7.title: The Bulletin Board
abovebeyond.professions.quests7.descript: &6The Bulletin Board&r provides means to earn currency for Trading.
Here you can complete various errands or buy a profession permit for use in the Trading Machine.

The avid salesman can come here for purchasing Trading Machines from the get go. This should help you take off!
abovebeyond.stage_1.title: &f1&r High Aspirations
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests0.title: Automatic Forest
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests0.subtitle: Contraption 1
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests0.description0: Building Material, Fuel and Ingredient. A passive supply of timber would be a good first effort.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests0.description1: Mechanical Saws are a powerful way to achieve this.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests0.tasks0.title: Any Wooden Log
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests0.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests1.title: Underwater Garden
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests1.subtitle: Contraption 3
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests1.description0: Kelp is vital ingredient to our first Assembly Line target: Andesite Alloy.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests1.description1: Kelp can be gathered automatically with Mechanical Harvesters.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests1.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests2.title: Catching Sediment
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests2.subtitle: Contraption 2
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests2.description0: A good way to automate Sand at this moment is to build Strainers.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests2.tasks0.title: Sand
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests2.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests3.title: Bedrock's Bounty
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests3.subtitle: Contraption 4
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests3.description0: Gathering Andesite manually takes time. Thankfully, bedrock can cause lava to form Andesite infinitely.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests3.description1: At this time it is best to set up drills to break generated blocks between lava and water.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests3.description2: Since bedrock is blocking the space beneath, you'll have to find a way to collect the drops from other sides.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests3.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests4.title: The Andesite Lift
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests4.subtitle: Contraption 5
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests4.description0: All your Andesite is likely not being generated near your factory. Figure out a way to bring it to the surface.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests4.tasks0.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests5.title: Clay Washer
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests5.subtitle: Contraption 6-1
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests5.description0: With the help of Encased Fans, sand can be refined into clay.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests5.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests6.title: Algae Blender
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests6.subtitle: Contraption 6-2
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests6.description0: In the Mix! Clay and Kelp can be processed with the Mechanical Mixer.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests6.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests7.title: Log Stripper
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests7.subtitle: Contraption 7-1
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests7.description0: Upwards-facing Mechanical Saws can process the harvested logs further...
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests7.tasks0.title: Any Stripped Log
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests7.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests8.title: Plank Cutter
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests8.subtitle: Contraption 7-2
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests8.tasks0.title: Any Planks
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests8.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests9.title: Cutter of Cut Planks
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests9.subtitle: Contraption 7-3
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests9.description0: ...and further, into the perfect base for our first Mechanism.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests9.description1: Note: before the machine starts showering you with random furniture, place a wooden slab in the filter slot of the Mechanical Saw.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests9.tasks0.title: Any Wooden Slab
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests9.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests10.title: Algaesite Mixer
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests10.subtitle: Contraption 6-4
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests10.description: In another Mix! This time it'll be the bricks and your surfaced Andesite Cobblestone.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests11.title: Algae Cooker
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests11.subtitle: Contraption 6-3
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests11.description: Smelt the Algal blend into bricks. While a Furnace works great, an Encased Fan can do it without the need of Fuel.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests12.title: Deploy, Deploy, Deploy.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests12.subtitle: Contraption 8
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests12.description: Bringing together Andesite Alloy and cut planks using a row of Deployers concludes your first Assembly Line.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests13.title: Arming the Deployer
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests13.description: It'll be good to stock up on a couple of saws for the Mechanism Assembly.
However, they are not nearly consumed as quickly as something that would require an automated supply.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests14.title: Chapter 1 Start!
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests14.description: These Quests are an Automation Plan for your upcoming Assembly Line. Always view them as recommendations on what you should construct a passive supply for. The flowgraph depicts the connections between relevant recipes/processing.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests15.title: Chapter 1 Complete!
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests15.description: Congrats! Now you have a passive supply of Kinetic Mechanisms. This is bound to change the pace a bit.
Before moving on, check back through your factory and search for any major bottlenecks.
It'd be a shame if a really efficient andesite generator is held back only by the sand not coming in quickly enough.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests16.title: Ah wait, don't chop
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests16.subtitle: Contraption 9-1
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests16.description: Liquid resin can be extracted from healthy Trees using Arboreal Extractors. The more the merrier.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests17.title: Rubber Stamper
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests17.subtitle: Contraption 9-2
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests17.description: Gather the resin via a network of Fluid Pipes and use a Basin-Press to solidify it.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests18.title: Curing by Flame
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests18.subtitle: Contraption 9-3
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests18.description: Finally, smelt the raw rubber into its cured state.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests19.title: All Sealed Up
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests19.description: From here it's really no hassle to do things manually. If you must, you can always come back with some Mechanical Crafters later on.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests20.title: Bonus 1A Complete!
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests20.description: Congrats! Now you have a good supply of Sealed Mechanisms. Your future self will thank you.
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests21.title: Speedrun
abovebeyond.stage_1.quests21.description: The rigid flowgraph of this guide may suggest that items aren't accessible until they have been automated.
Be reassured that you already have access to tools from later ages, such as filtering- though not without a bit of manual effort.
abovebeyond.stage_2.title: &f2&r Alluring Expedience
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests0.title: Chapter 2 Start!
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests0.description0: The Automation Target this time is the Electron Tube. Placing them onto the Kinetic Mechanism will send you to the next tier.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests1.title: Temporary Sand
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests1.description0: Initially, Certus Quartz Seeds require sand to be crafted. However, for full automation it might be worthwhile to bypass that requirement with the help of Mechanical Crafters.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests2.title: Quartz Seeds
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests2.subtitle: Contraption 12-1
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests2.description0: This piece of quartz is too small. With enough water we might get somewhere.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests2.description1: If you're not too stoked about waiting hours on crystal growth, you can set up Water Spouts to greatly accellerate the process.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests3.title: Growth Started
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests3.subtitle: Contraption 12-2
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests4.title: Growth Continued
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests4.subtitle: Contraption 12-3
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests5.title: Growth Completed
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests5.subtitle: Contraption 12-4
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests5.description0: Finally, a fully grown crystal. Don't forget to send every second one back around for seed production!
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests5.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests6.title: Water Supply
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests6.description0: The contraptions of Chapter 2 require a healthy supply of water. The easiest way is to pull from water sources directly using Mechanical Pumps and a fluid pipe network.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests6.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests7.title: Skystone Infini-mill
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests7.subtitle: Contraption 11
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests7.description0: You can just keep on pulverising it. Sky Stone blocks never seem to lose mass in the process. What a world we live in!
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests7.description1: Find Sky Stone Blocks at Meteor crash sites. If you haven't encountered any, try looking for one using the Meteorite compass.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests7.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests8.title: Skystone Mixer
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests8.subtitle: Contraption 13-1
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests8.description0: Dissolving this strange reactive powder in water creates a fun and useful liquid.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests8.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests9.title: Charged Mixer
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests9.subtitle: Contraption 13-2
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests9.description0: Discharging an Energized Certus Quartz Crystal into the liquid creates a solution that reminds you of liquid redstone.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests9.description1: Notice that the mixing process returns an inert quartz ready to be recharged using Contraption 14.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests9.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests10.title: Get Melted
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests10.subtitle: Contraption 15-4
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests10.description: Route the nuggets into your High-Temperature melting equipment. A Melter from Tinkers' Construct, for example.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests11.title: Second Coating Layer
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests11.subtitle: Contraption 15-5
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests11.description: Spout a droplet of Molten Iron onto the Rose Quartz Crystal to create a fully functional Electron Tube.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests12.title: The (Re-)Charger
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests12.subtitle: Contraption 14
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests12.description: Set up a little cycle to recharge any Certus Quartz used as a Catalyst in Contraption 13-2.
The Charger from AE2 can be used here, along with the Item Trasportation of choice.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests13.title: Iron for Days
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests13.subtitle: Contraption 15-1
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests13.description: Known in the business as the 'Iron Generator', you will now be creating metal from Cobblestone.
Start with some Drills hooked up to regenerating Cobblestone blocks.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests14.title: Keep on Deploying
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests14.subtitle: Contraption 16
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests14.description: Bringing together Electron Tubes and Kinetic Mechanisms using a row of Deployers concludes your second Assembly Line.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests15.title: Chapter 2 Complete!
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests15.description: Congrats! Now you have a passive supply of Precision Mechanisms. Think of all the options you have access to!
After cleaning up and briefly scanning for bottlenecks, go ahead and check back with the Overview section.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests16.title: De-Chunkify
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests16.subtitle: Contraption 15-2
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests16.description: The Cobblestone first needs to be milled down into Gravel.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests17.title: Ferric Traces
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests17.subtitle: Contraption 15-3
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests17.description: Washing the Gravel with an Encased Fan leaves you with Iron Nuggets and Flint.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests18.title: Painted Quartz Mixer
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests18.subtitle: Contraption 13-3
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests18.description: In a third and final Mixer, our freshly grown Crystals will be treated to a nice and energetic re-design.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests19.title: Heated Treatment
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests19.subtitle: Contraption 18-2
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests19.description: Dropping the Liquids onto a Precision Mechanism will convert it to its Infernal counterpart.
Once again, full automation of bonus mechanisms is not as pressing a task, since they do not lead to any further machines beyond their own.
A semi-automatic setup for converting Precision Mechanisms whenever needed should suffice.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests20.title: A lot. of lava
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests20.subtitle: Contraption 18-1
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests20.description: Every Zinc Machine will end up using 24 Buckets of Lava in Production. It's not a great ecological footprint, but even just one Hose Pulley can make quick work of it.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests21.title: Soul Distillery
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests21.subtitle: Contraption 17-3
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests21.description: Drop all the harvested vines into a Heated Mixing Basin.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests22.title: The Double Decker I
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests22.subtitle: Contraption 17-1
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests22.description: For the all-mighty Infernal Mechanism, a bountiful source of soul essence is needed. Thankfully, the vines of the underworld seem to carry it in them.
Twisting Vines grow upwards, you can gather them using Mechanical Harvesters.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests23.title: The Double Decker II
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests23.subtitle: Contraption 17-2
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests23.description: Weeping Vines grow downwards from a ceiling. You can gather them with Mechanical Harvesters.
For style points, you can use the same contraption to harvest both vine types simultaneously.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests24.title: Arming the Deployer II
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests24.description: It'll be good to stock up on a couple of screwdrivers for the Mechanism Assembly.
Just like last time, the requirement does not necessarily call for automation.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests25.title: Bonus 2A Complete!
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests25.description: Fantastic Work! You have mastered the challenges of the nether; you couldn't be more well-prepared for the upcoming Assembly Line.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests26.title: The Alloy Mixer
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests26.subtitle: Contraption 10
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests26.description: Not part of the Mechanism Chain, yet very important for creating relevant machines.
Using Melters, Fluid Pipes and a Mechanical Mixer, you can create a couple of different metal alloys. Brass is one of them.
Pumping the Molten Alloy into a Casting Table or Basin will Solidify it into usable Ingots.
For less hassles with manual effort, it is recommended to set up Ingot-to-Ingot semi-automation for creating Alloys using the setup above.
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests27.title: Blaze Escort
abovebeyond.stage_2.quests27.description: For the first time in the progression, a Blaze Burner is required. Obtain them by using Empty Blaze Burners on Blazes or their Spawners.
abovebeyond.stage_3.title: &f3&r The Catharsis
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests0.title: Chapter 3 Start!
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests0.description0: Working towards a passive supply of Radiant Induction Coils, you'll be sure to encounter some new and unfamiliar tasks.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests0.description1: Once again it's time to grab the Wrench, re-stock the toolbox and to clear out a new plot.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests1.title: Let there be light
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests1.subtitle: Contraption 27
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests1.description0: The production of Refined Radiance requires either a steady supply of light emitting blocks, or an active Beacon Beam.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests1.description1: Choose which path you would like to take, and provide necessary preparation/automation.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests2.title: Your Favourite Colour
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests2.subtitle: Contraption 25
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests2.description0: For production of chromatic materials, a colour pigment is needed. It is up to you which colour dye should be automated for this purpose. The only exception is white dye.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests2.tasks0.title: Dyes except White
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests2.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests3.title: Spectral Correction (Red)
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests3.description0: Crushing Dyed Singularities has a chance to yield little orbs of red colour.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests3.description1: Since this is not the colour needed for chromatic compound, you can use Item Drains for frequency correction.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests4.title: Spectral Correction (Yellow)
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests4.description0: Crushing Dyed Singularities has a chance to yield little orbs of yellow colour, aswell.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests4.description1: Much like the red ones, these have to be drained once again to shift the frequency in the right direction.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests5.title: Spectral Correction (Green)
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests6.title: Spectral Correction (Blue)
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests6.description0: Being almost there, all the Paint Balls now brought to the blue frequency will have to be run through the Item Drain one last time.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests7.title: Spectral Correction (Magenta)
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests7.subtitle: Contraption 26-2
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests7.description0: Magenta Paint Balls contain the essence needed for production of Chromatic Compound. Some will come directly from the crushed singularity, but the majority can be obtained by spectral correction on the other colours.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests7.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests8.title: Colours Refined
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests8.subtitle: Contraption 26-3
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests8.description0: Use Mechanical Crafters once more to refine the paint orbs into Chromatic Compound.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests8.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests9.title: Throwing Flash
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests9.subtitle: Contraption 28-1
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests9.description0: When dropped as an item, Chromatic Compound will absorb light around itself and eventually turn into Refined Radiance. Choose one of three approaches:
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests9.description1: - Autoplacing light emitting blocks near the dropped compound items (blocks need line of sight to item)
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests9.description2: - Supplying light emitting blocks as items on nearby depots/belts (blocks need line of sight to item)
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests9.description3: - Throwing the compound into a Beacon Beam for free and instant conversion
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests9.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests10.title: Neon lights
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests10.subtitle: Contraption 28-3
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests10.description: And finally, one last Crafter to cut and wind up the radiant sheet into an Induction Coil.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests11.title: More Cobblestone
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests11.subtitle: Contraption 20-1
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests11.description: The trusty and cheap multi-purpose material of cobblestone is making its comeback.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests12.title: Deploy the Payload
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests12.subtitle: Contraption 29
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests12.description: You know the drill. It is time to upgrade your previously automated Precision Mechanisms to the next level!
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests13.title: Chapter 3 Complete!
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests13.description: Congrats! Inductive Mechanisms will now be generated passively. This opens the door to new exciting technological and magical exploits!
Once you are happy with the Assembly Line, head on back to the overview. There will be new options to explore.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests14.title: Inception
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests14.subtitle: Contraption 20-3
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests14.description: By Crushing the Crushing Wheels using Crushing Wheels, a strange anomaly is created and dropped. We can use this to our advantage.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests15.title: The Reactor
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests15.subtitle: Contraption 24
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests15.description: Here comes the central feature of this Factory Wing: the Reactor.

Progressing towards Inductive Coils requires a controlled Explosion where nearby Singularities and Ender Dust are combined. See if you can come up with a circuit to continuously blow up these dropped item-stacks.

Note: Ender dust and Singularities are consumed in a 1:1 ratio. They do not have to be in the exact same location. One TNT can transform multiple sets of ingredients. The result will drop at the location of the Singularity item.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests16.title: Checker Crafters
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests16.subtitle: Contraption 23-2
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests16.description: Use Mechanical Crafters to build TNT. Since most of its slots will have to be supplied individually, a mechanical Arm might help for provinding the necessary logistics.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests17.title: Cooking up some Gunpowder
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests17.subtitle: Contraption 22-2
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests17.description: Transmuting the green reactive blend requires very special heating conditions, only available on Campfires or Stoves.
This Contraption will need the special ability to both place and collect items from these places.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests18.title: More Sand
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests18.subtitle: Contraption 23-1
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests18.description: Sand will be required to build the Explosives needed for the Reactor. Thankfully, new standards have allowed you access to Crushing Wheels, which make sand production a lot less of a nuisance.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests19.title: Cooking up some Ender Dust
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests19.subtitle: Contraption 22-3
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests19.description: Transmuting the purple reactive blend requires very special heating conditions, only available on Campfires or Stoves.
This Contraption will need the special ability to both place and collect items from these places.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests20.title: Painting Space itself
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests20.subtitle: Contraption 26-1
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests20.description: Mixing the Entangled Singularities with a dye of choice creates the very essence of colour! Just what we need for producing a perfected chromatic compound.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests21.title: Bonus 3A Complete!
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests21.description: Marvellous! The power of instant transportation is in your hands at last. Surely there are some places in your factory where this could really speed things up.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests22.title: Enderium Infused
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests22.description: And finally, upgrade some of your Inductive Mechanisms in the Smelter using the newly obtained Alloy.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests23.title: Gateway Expedition
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests23.description: After your flawless encounter with the Ender Dragon, make your way to the Gateway and travel to the outer Islands.
Here you should be able to find the poise bushes necessary for creating Enderium Alloy.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests24.title: The Poise Cycle
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests24.description: Thanks to Inductive Technology, you have the option to replicate Poise Bushes passively, should you require a steadier and more convenient supply of Enderium.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests25.title: Alien Alloys
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests25.description: Fire up your Induction Smelter for two rounds of processing:
First off, refine your Silver Ingots with Ender Dust and Poise Bushes.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests26.title: Insert Coin
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests26.description: The Special properties of Silver can prove useful in creating Enderium Alloy.
As it turns out, the only source of Silver seems to be your money. Makes you wonder where the official mints get it from..
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests27.title: Dissolved
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests27.description: Take the coins and throw them into your Smeltery. Watch out: this is an irreversible process.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests28.title: Not the End
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests28.description: The Secrets to Teleportation lie behind the dimensional gate to the End.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests29.title: Arming the Deployer III
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests29.description: It'll be good to stock up on a couple of resonators for the Mechanism Assembly.
Don't worry about automating them fully, though.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests30.title: Express Sticks
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests30.subtitle: Contraption 19
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests30.description: For this next trick a supply of Wooden Sticks is required. Whether that calls for a new harvester or just a scheduled shipment from Contraption 1 is up to you.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests31.title: The Wall
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests31.subtitle: Contraption 20-2
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests31.description: Next up, we need Crushing Wheels. Not only as a machine, but as an ingredient, too.
Walls of Mechanical Crafters can quickly get in the way of paths and other infrastructure. Make sure to give them some space.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests32.title: Toxic Byproducts
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests32.description: Draining paint balls creates a significant amount of liquid byproduct, which has to be disposed of before it starts clogging up the production line.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests33.title: Cooking up some Fertiliser
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests33.subtitle: Contraption 22-4
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests33.description: Transmuting the blue reactive blend requires very special heating conditions, only available on Campfires or Stoves.
This Contraption will need the special ability to both place and collect items from these places.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests34.title: Mysterious Biomass
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests34.subtitle: Contraption 22-1
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests34.description: Route the excess leaves into a crusher, in preparation for the upcoming magic trick.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests35.title: The Spirit Cycle
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests35.subtitle: Contraption 21
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests35.description: Slimy Ferns have the property of instant regeneration when exposed to Spirit Fire. Much like the Quartz Incubator in the other Factory, we can use this property to create a passive supply.

The cycle is simple: Cut the fern plant into halves using a Deployer, then throw one of the leaves into Spirit Fire. It is recommended to ensure that all colours of fern are duplicated at similar rates.
Create Spirit Fire by tossing a Demon's Dream Fruit on the floor and then setting a fire in its space.
Oh, and keep a backup of each fern somewhere safe.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests36.title: Post-Process
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests36.subtitle: Contraption 28-2
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests36.description: The main work is done. All that's left is a small assembly line to process Refined Radiance into Radiant Coils.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests37.title: Expensive Bricks
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests37.description: Cast the molten silver into an Ingot and admire how shiny it is.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests38.title: Ender for Garnish
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests38.description: Set aside some Ender dust from your Reactor. In case your supply is bottlenecked, you can use Ender Pearls, too.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests39.title: Slimy Ferns
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests39.description: In order to produce Gunpowder, Bone Meal and Ender Dust, the peculiar 'slimy fern' can be used as an alternative to Monster farms.
Roam the lands for a bit and look out for egregiously vibrant spots of colour in the vegetation. Don't forget to bring a pair of Shears.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests40.title: Overcorrection
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests40.description: Oops! Draining the colour's essence one too many times will create a mundane paint ball not able to be used for further processing.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests41.title: I like Mobs, actually
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests41.subtitle: Alt. Contraption 21 \& 22
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests41.description: An automation alternative to the Spirit Cycle is to set up a Monster Spawner of some kind.
Click the Checkmark to skip the Fern Duplication Contraption.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests42.title: Keeping Stock
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests42.description: A few of the following contraptions involve dropping items on the ground. Whenever a process will not backstack on overflow (e.g. belt items waiting automatically), it is important to toggle the production at certain buffer thresholds.
More concretely: When the output buffer exceeds 75%%, stop producing items. Once it reaches below 25%%, start the process up again. This prevents overflow and machines from spewing items everywhere.
The Stockpile Switch is designed for this purpose exactly.
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests43.title: Mechanical Auto Hammer
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests43.subtitle: Contraption 30
abovebeyond.stage_3.quests43.description: Aside from the Inductive Mechanism, Invar Machinery builds on a tough Metal Alloy between Iron and Nickel.
Since the full refinement process of Invar takes a few lengthy steps, automation is recommended.
abovebeyond.stage_4.title: &f4&r Into the Box
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests0.title: Chapter 4 Start!
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests0.description0: The next target will be Printed Silicon. As one of two known ways to obtain it, the assembly line will move items, fluids and energy in and out of the new and rather compact Invar Machinery.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests0.description1: Much like previous chapters, a few new material sources or shipments are required first.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests1.title: Ready to Deploy
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests1.subtitle: Contraption 40-2
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests1.description0: For one last time, a line of Deployers will be needed to upgrade the previous mechanism to the next tier.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests1.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests2.title: Chapter 4 Complete!
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests2.description0: Great work! The final assembly line is now complete. Your factory just entered the Digital Age.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests2.description1: New options have opened up in the Overview. Whenever you are ready.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests3.title: Sand Delivery
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests3.subtitle: Contraption 31-1
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests3.description0: A new Shipment of Sand should be scheduled, for it is significantly rich in silicon.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests3.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests4.title: Ball o' Sand
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests4.subtitle: Contraption 31-2
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests4.description0: First, the raw blocks are washed and refined into small orbs of wet sand.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests4.description1: Since they could easily collapse, they should never be stacked on top of another. The inductive Fluid Encapsulator should have the necessary precision to generate these reliably.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests4.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests5.title: Liquid Sand
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests5.description0: Sifting for Coarse Sand creates a byproduct relevant for further refining the silicon compound.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests6.title: Coarse Sand
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests6.subtitle: Contraption 31-3
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests6.description0: Rolling the sand ball over an item drain reveals the larger chunks contained within.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests6.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests7.title: Crystalline Sand
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests7.subtitle: Contraption 33-3
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests7.description0: Enriching coarse sand with earth charges creates Sand Crystals. Not much more processing is left until the Silicon content reaches a state usable for circuits.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests7.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests8.title: Pyrolyzer Round I
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests8.subtitle: Contraption 34-2
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests8.description0: A Pyrolisation process is not strictly required for Charcoal, but the increased yield makes it worthwhile if the wood supply is limited.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests9.title: Pyrolyzer Round II
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests9.subtitle: Contraption 34-3
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests9.description0: In a secondary, more lengthy pyrolisation process, Coal Coke is formed. An ideal material for both refining Silicon and to provide heat as Solid Fuel.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests9.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests10.title: Controlled Cuts
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests10.subtitle: Contraption 35
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests10.description: Using Mechanical Saws and Water, the coke can to be cut up into chunks in order to become a more effective catalyst.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests11.title: The Merge
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests11.subtitle: Contraption 36
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests11.description: The process of refining silicon requires a blend of Sand Crystals, Fine Sand and the Carbon Catalyst.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests12.title: Concentrated Heat
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests12.subtitle: Contraption 33-2
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests12.description: Compact enough powder back together to create the highly reactive Earth Charge.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests13.title: Basalz Mill
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests13.subtitle: Contraption 33-1
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests13.description: Before it is ready for processing, the basalz essence needs a bit of refinement.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests14.title: Hot Laser
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests14.subtitle: Contraption 32-2
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests14.description: The first Alchemical Laser forms activated basalz essence from Basalt. This works only if a charged FluxoMagnet is present alongside it in the Hopper Cart.

A reliable way to automate the Laser is to use two Cart Loaders, one to place a magnet, one to fill the remaining slots with Basalt Blocks. Move the cart under the laser and activate it. From here you can use one Unloader to extract the worn magnet as well as the desired output.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests15.title: Modern Cobblegen
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests15.subtitle: Contraption 32-1
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests15.description: Basalt is an accessible type of rock that contains traces of inert Basalz Powder. For the purposes of this, a steady supply of them is needed.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests16.title: Flux Charger
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests16.subtitle: Contraption 32-3
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests16.description: In order for the basalz essence to form, the FluxoMagnet present in the cart has to be charged.
Therefore, the contraption will have to route the magnets from the cart unloader through an Energetic Infuser before passing it back into the circuit.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests17.title: Snowball Machine
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests17.subtitle: Contraption 37
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests17.description: New Invar Technology makes forming snowballs out of Water quite a simple process. Perhaps we should set aside a few for our next unannounced visitor..
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests18.title: Entropy Charger
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests18.subtitle: Contraption 38-2
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests18.description: In order for the blizz essence to form, the Entropy Manipulator present in the cart has to be charged.
Ensure the charge in it restored before its next use.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests19.title: Cool Laser
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests19.subtitle: Contraption 38-1
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests19.description: The second Alchemical Laser forms activated blizz essence from Snowballs. This works only if a charged Entropy Manipulator is present alongside it in the Hopper Cart.
Your automation strategy from Contraption 32 will perform just as effective here.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests20.title: Blizz Mill
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests20.subtitle: Contraption 39-1
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests20.description: Just like earlier, the essence becomes usable only after a bit of refinement.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests21.title: Concentrated Cold
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests21.subtitle: Contraption 39-2
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests21.description: Compact enough powder back together to create the highly reactive Ice Charge.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests22.title: Final Induction
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests22.subtitle: Contraption 39-3
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests22.description: One final pass in the Induction Smelter now produces a chunk of high-quality Silicon.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests23.title: Circuit Stamper
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests23.subtitle: Contraption 40-1
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests23.description: Use Deployers to create a circuit base out of silicon. The required Press can be located at the center of Sky Stone Meteors.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests24.title: Secrets uncovered
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests24.description: The Secret path has been discovered and pursued. From here, getting the Calculation Mechanism will be trivial.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests25.title: The Alchemical Laser
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests25.description: A central role in this age of technology is played by the Alchemical Laser.
It usually involves converting one material into another, using a high-energy beam and a catalyst or tool of some kind.
Inventors can familiarise themselves with the necessary machinery components via JEI or via entering
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests26.title: Wood Delivery
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests26.subtitle: Contraption 34-1
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests26.description: It'll be good to order a Wood supply to this location. Aside from Silicon it can contribute to this assembly line for some other useful products.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests27.title: Arming the Deployer IV
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests27.description: The installation process of Calculation Mechanisms can be facilitated by a Flash Drive.
The precious Cobalt required can be found in the Nether.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests28.title: Unboxing
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests28.subtitle: Contraption 39-A
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests28.description: Separate the Silicon from its jar using a Reagent Extractor.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests29.title: Coal Juice
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests29.description: Creosote is created as a by-product. It can be used as an additional Fuel Source.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests30.title: Express Circuitry I
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests30.subtitle: Contraption 41-1
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests30.description: Additional Processors are required in creating logistical components of ME Technology. At some point some Semi-Automation should come into consideration.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests31.title: Express Circuitry II
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests31.subtitle: Contraption 41-2
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests31.description: Assembling the Processors is not a trivial process. But it sure is fun to watch it work.
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests32.title: New Capacity
abovebeyond.stage_4.quests32.description: The upcoming Assembly Line will require a significant amount of flux energy to run. It is recommended to find a suitable generation method and to consider higher scales in planning should it become necessary later.
abovebeyond.stage_4b.title: &f4a&r Chaotic Alchemy
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests0.title: Another way forward
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests0.description: As an alternative, more risky approach to a refined Silicon resource, Laser Alchemy can provide an obscure yet rewarding new path of progression.
Discover the secret codes of each reagent class in order to learn about the recipe of Chaos Catalysts.
Once found, the Chaos Catalyst can not only transmute a material into Silicon, but potentially create other valuable resources from the most trivial ingredients!
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests1.title: Encapsulate - Decapsulate
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests1.description: Aside from the Alchemical Laser setup, you'll need a few other Machines for your new Alchemy Lab.
- The Fluid Encapsulator uses Molten Glass to create Reagents from resources.
- The Reagent Extractor can reverse this process.
- The Centrifugal Separator is required to analyse alchemical blends for clues. A vital routine when researching the recipe of Catalysts.
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests38.descriptio: If this is Unlocked, you have gathered all reagents of the Igneous Category.
The Igneous Catalyst can be created by a combination of four reagents of this Category in the Alchemical Laser. &7(See the Catalyst's JEI entry for more information)
It's recommended to always take notes of previous results. This way it is not uncommon to find the solution in under six attempts!
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests39.descriptio: If this is Unlocked, you have gathered all reagents of the Herbal Category.
The Herbal Catalyst can be created by a combination of four reagents of this Category in the Alchemical Laser. &7(See the Catalyst's JEI entry for more information)
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests40.descriptio: If this is Unlocked, you have gathered all reagents of the Volatile Category.
The Volatile Catalyst can be created by a combination of four reagents of this Category in the Alchemical Laser. &7(See the Catalyst's JEI entry for more information)
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests41.descriptio: If this is Unlocked, you have gathered all reagents of the Crystalline Category.
The Crystalline Catalyst can be created by a combination of four reagents of this Category in the Alchemical Laser. &7(See the Catalyst's JEI entry for more information)
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests42.descriptio: If this is Unlocked, you have gathered all reagents of the Metallurgic Category.
The Metallurgic Catalyst can be created by a combination of four reagents of this Category in the Alchemical Laser. &7(See the Catalyst's JEI entry for more information)
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests43.descriptio: If this is Unlocked, you have gathered all reagents of the Gemstone Category.
The Gemstone Catalyst can be created by a combination of four reagents of this Category in the Alchemical Laser. &7(See the Catalyst's JEI entry for more information)
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests44.title: The Final Code
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests44.descriptio: If this is Unlocked, you have gathered Catalysts of every Category.
This Ultimate Catalyst is now a combination of four of the Catalysts, much in the way the Catalysts are found and made by their Reagents.
&7(See this item's JEI entry for more information)
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests45.title: The Discovery
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests45.descriptio: Armed with the Chaos Catalyst, you will find all manner of transmutation pairs among the Reagents above.

Simply put the Chaos Catalyst and a few jars of one reagent (The transmutation is lossy) into the hopper cart and find a different reagent returned after activating the laser. Mind that the Catalyst is never consumed in the process.

One of the Reagents should lead not to another known one, but to the Reagent of Silicon. If this turns out to be one that is reasonably accessible, you can consider choosing this path of production over the main one.
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests46.title: The Alchemical Laser
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests46.descriptio: A central role in your Laboratory is played by the Alchemical Laser.

The Laser is the only way to obtain Catalysts or to find the necessary clues toward their recipe. Another use is the actual application of the Chaos Catalyst to a specific Reagent, causing the Transmutation.
Inventors can familiarise themselves with the necessary machinery components via JEI or via entering
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests47.title: Automatic Chaos
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests47.subtitle: Contraption 31-A
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests47.descriptio: With the transmutation recipe in hand, it is time to build a facility able to create an infinite amount of Silicon Reagent via Laser Alchemy and the other steps part of the process.

Note that the concete solution depends highly on the transmutation pairings of your World, which is why it cannot be laid out in this Guide. You can use JEI to find other necessary recipes leading up to the reagent you require.
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests48.title: Warp Zone
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests48.descriptio: Now that you have a passive supply of Silicon Reagent, you may head over to the main section of Chapter 4. You will have opened up an entry point near the end of its recipe chain.
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests49.title: Clueless
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests49.descriptio: Glowstone or Redstone Accelerator can optionally be placed in the fifth slot of the Hopper Minecart when entering a catalyst code.
This may reveal additional information about the correct combination as described in their tooltip.
abovebeyond.stage_4b.quests50.descriptio: Your coins seem to have a corresponding Reagent, too. Though do not expect to be able to mint new currency out of your silver ingots.
abovebeyond.stage_5.title: &f5&r Divide by Digital
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests0.title: Finale Start!
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests0.description0: Welcome to the final Chapter of this Journey: building the Data Centre. What will this entail? Thousands of numeric calculations!
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests0.description1: But do not fear, as an inventor you will let your creation do all the work for you, as usual.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests0.description2: Cast the combined logic of all your Calculation Mechanisms into two digits, from which you will calculate 8 others through a series of crafting operations. A digital ME system is recommended for managing the logistics, though not strictly required.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests1.title: We have lift off!
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests1.description0: With everything in place and the Matrices programmed, you can go ahead and assemble the Guidance Computer and add it to your Spaceship.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests1.description1: Take a minute to craft a flag representing your space program to bring to the moon. You can apply patterns to it just like a Banner.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests1.description2: In your own time, take a seat in your assembled rocket, and press Space.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests1.tasks1.title: Any Flag
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests2.title: Solving Trajectories
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests2.subtitle: Contraption 45
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests2.description0: For the calculations of the Guidance computer, we will need.. a lot of these Digits.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests2.description1: Before letting items exit the logistical ecosystem of the calculations, make sure each digit leaves in equal amounts. Brass Tunnels can solve this issue in a straight-forward fashion.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests2.description2: Each digit now has to be dissolved back into its liquified form via Smeltery. Once a Smeltery collected 10 liquified items of each digit, they combine into the encoded logic required for our Computer. Once enough of this figurative alloy has accumulated, it can be cast into the powerful Computation Matrix.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests2.description3: The Guidance Computer requires 8 Matrices to function. Depending on your data centre and mechanism assembly lines, this may take a while.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests3.title: Processing Power
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests3.subtitle: Contraption 42
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests3.description0: In order to provide 'Mechanical' Calculators with numbers and operators, all available Calculation Mechanisms have to be melted down into the figurative processing power they provide.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests3.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests4.subtitle: Contraption 43-1
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests4.description0: As one of the two available digits, Threes can be cast from unprocessed logic. Together with the Eight and available Operators, your Calculators will have to create the remaining digits from 0 to 9 in equal amounts.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests4.description1: This casting process can quickly become a bottleneck, for most running calculations depend on the numbers generated here. Make sure things move fluently.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests4.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests5.subtitle: Contraption 43-3
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests5.description0: The second available Digit is the Eight. It can be cast from unprocessed logic.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests5.description1: From here, plan via which calculations the other digits will be created, and how the cost can be minimised. Remember that each added calculation step ends up increasing the amount of Calculation Mechanisms required for the digit it leads to.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests5.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests6.subtitle: Contraption 44-8
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests6.description0: 3-3, 2-2, 8-8,...? A total of 39 options exist to calculate zeros. A tough decision!
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests6.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests7.subtitle: Contraption 44-1
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests7.description0: 3-2, 4/4, 8-7,...? A total of 21 options exist to calculate ones. Whichever will it be?
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests7.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests8.subtitle: Contraption 44-2
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests8.description0: 3-1, 8/4, 1+1,...? A total of 17 options exist to calculate twos. Any favourites?
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests8.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests9.subtitle: Contraption 44-3
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests9.description0: 6-2, 2x2, 3+1,...? A total of 16 options exist to calculate fours. Choose wisely.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests9.tasks1.title: Automated
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests10.subtitle: Contraption 44-4
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests10.description: 3+2, 6-1, 8-3,...? A total of 14 options exist to calculate fives. How do you want to do this?
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests11.subtitle: Contraption 44-5
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests11.description: 3x2, 3+3, 8-2,...? A total of 16 options exist to calculate sixes. May the best be victorious.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests12.subtitle: Contraption 44-6
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests12.description: 9-2, 4+3, 8-1,...? A total of 14 options exist to calculate sevens. Feeling Lucky?
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests13.subtitle: Contraption 44-7
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests13.description: 3x3, 4+5, 8+1,...? A total of 15 options exist to calculate nines. The choice is yours.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests14.title: Upcycle Bin
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests14.subtitle: Contraption 47
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests14.description: Rocketry Equipment is built from the light but robust material of Matter Plastics. Matter Balls can be created in a Matter Condenser.

First, insert a 1k ME Storage Component into the Matter Condenser, set it to produce Matter Balls and then supply it with the most abundant flow of items you can come up with. Don't throw your valuables in; the items are consumed in the process.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests15.title: Expensive Bricks II
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests15.description: Create bars of Matter Plastics in a Super-Heated Compacter. You'll need a couple of these.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests16.title: Black Gold
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests16.description: For powering our Rocket, we will require some very potent fuel. Search some of the warmer biomes for a source of Crude Oil. You cannot miss it.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests17.title: Hydrocarbon Sorter I
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests17.description: Crude Oil can be refined into Heavy Oil using a Fractionating Still.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests18.title: Hydrocarbon Sorter II
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests18.description: Refining Crude Oil into Heavy Oil creates a by-product of Light Oil.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests19.title: Hydrocarbon Sorter III
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests19.subtitle: Contraption 46
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests19.description: Both Heavy and Light Oil can be further refined into suitable Rocket Fuel.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests20.title: Treat for Heat
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests20.description: To form Matter Plastics, we need temperatures unreachable by even the most overclocked Invar Machines. However, your little Blaze friend will be happy to trade...
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests21.title: Attire
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests21.description: If you intend to survive past the landing, a special set of armour will be required.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests22.title: Where to?
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests22.description: In order for your Guidance Computer to know its Destination, a Planet Id Chip has to be inserted.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests23.title: Electrolysis
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests23.subtitle: Contraption 48
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests23.description: In order to fill your Oxygen Tanks, stand on a Gas Charge Pad with oxygen in its internal storage.
Suitable Oxygen can be gained by separating water into its components via heated mixing.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests24.title: Launch Pad Structure
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests24.subtitle: Contraption 49
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests24.description: The Launch Pad for your Rocket requires special surface materials and reinforcement structures.
In order to learn about the specific guidelines, locate the ponder scene of the Guidance Computer, or use the command
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests25.title: Pipeless Loading
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests25.description: A couple of additional Gadgets are required in order to load the rocket with fuel. For usages refer to the Ponder Scene of the Guidance Computer.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests26.title: Operators
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests26.subtitle: Contraption 43-2
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests26.description: Without the operators, a data center would not be able to combine digits into others. Provide your Calculators with an automated supply of any operator they end up requiring.
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests27.title: The Spaceship
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests27.subtitle: Contraption &b50
abovebeyond.stage_5.quests27.description: With the Launch Pad in place, it is time to construct your Spaceship.
Give it your best, after all this is the final Contraption you've been working towards.
&7Though perhaps keep the palette simple- with the state that mod is in, see if you can avoid using any funky special rendered blocks here. Crashing to this now would be devastating.
abovebeyond.welcome.title: Welcome
abovebeyond.welcome.quests0.title: Limitless Potential
abovebeyond.welcome.quests0.description1: We hope you'll have a good time with it.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests1.title: Completely Optional
abovebeyond.welcome.quests1.description0: The Questing system helps you with the primary customisations of the Modpack: &3Trades&r and the &6Progression of Tech&r
abovebeyond.welcome.quests1.description1: Completing Quests is not required to progress through the game.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests2.title: I
abovebeyond.welcome.quests2.description1: The sandbox has been turned upside down - be ready to invent your best Create Contraptions yet.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests2.description2: &7(Or the first, if you are that brave!)
abovebeyond.welcome.quests3.title: II
abovebeyond.welcome.quests3.description0: About fifty inventions lie between you and the moon.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests3.description1: Thousands of components will flow through the ever-growing sequence of your machines, providing the means to explore the next level of technology.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests4.title: III
abovebeyond.welcome.quests4.description0: Your entire factory will be put to the test as final products flow into the Data Centre, programming the Guidance computer of your Spaceship.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests4.description1: Every step is different, some may even differ depending on the generation seed of your World.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests5.title: IV
abovebeyond.welcome.quests5.description1: Fund the operation with coin provided either from various errands, or your chosen professions.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests5.description2: Automatically ship produce from your farms or gather other players to aid you in your mission.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests5.description3: Then you can purchase all manner of resources, artifacts and building blocks from the market, making your life just a little bit easier.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests6.title: Quest Content Overwiew
abovebeyond.welcome.quests6.description0: - &6The Bulletin Board&r provides means to earn currency for Trading.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests6.description1: Here you can complete various errands or buy a profession permit for use in the Trading Machine.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests6.description2: - &6The Market&r gives you options to spend your money on a variety of fun and useful items and gadgets.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests6.description3: - &6Shipments&r are the Automated way to exchange coin for resources. Here you can buy Import Cards for use in the Trading Machine.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests6.description4: - The &3Factory Guide&r provides useful information for the path of Technology and Automation. All challenges to be overcome have been neatly organised into chapters and tasks. It is entirely optional to follow this Guide.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests6.description5: - The Section on &3Metallurgy&r gives an overview of the ways to turn your ore into refined metal. Different paths yield differently.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests6.description6: - &3Lifesavers&r brings a spotlight to all those little utilities that can help you overcome the challenges set before you.
abovebeyond.welcome.quests7.title: Off you go
abovebeyond.welcome.quests7.description0: Now that you have an idea of what is new and what is not, settle in and start your Journey.
